domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse U know what his problem is? He has to see it to react to it. He couldn’t get ahead of it and see it coming like Kap could. He couldn’t see Covid19 and get ahead of it like congress told him should. He’s too fucking stupid to understand anything until it happens.
